item.title: German reinsurers took a $1.9 billion profit hit from LA wildfires in first quarter
item.description: The wildfires, which devastated Los Angeles in January, led to claims worth almost $1.9 billion for two of the worldâ€™s biggest reinsurers.

item.title: Honda Motor reports 76% plunge in operating profit in huge earnings miss
item.description: Revenue for the full financial year rose 6.2%, but operating profit fell 12.2% and missed expectations.

item.title: SoftBank Vision Funds swing to annual loss as investment gains slow by 40%
item.description: Softbank's Vision Fund business posted a loss in the fiscal year ended March as it posted slowing gains at its massive tech investment arm.

item.title: Saudi oil giant Aramco posts 5% dip in first-quarter profit on weaker crude prices
item.description: Saudi Aramco's first-quarter net profit fell 5% year-on-year amid lower oil prices and production.

item.title: Lyft closes 28% higher after issuing buyback and posting bookings growth
item.description: Lyft shares popped 28% after the ride-sharing company upped its share buyback plan and posted better-than-expected gross bookings.
